title: We’re Underwater on Our Truck (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Selling (half) a house,

What to do when you're underwater on a vehicle,

Using funds from mutual funds that were gifted.

Saving up for a house vs. investing in retirement.


Support Our Sponsor:
Carwiser

Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.
